013package org.apache.juneau.xml.annotation;
014
015import static java.lang.annotation.ElementType.*;
016import static java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy.*;
017import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ArrayUtils.*;
018
019import java.lang.annotation.*;
020import org.apache.juneau.*;
021import org.apache.juneau.annotation.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.reflect.*;
023import org.apache.juneau.svl.*;
024
025/**
026 * Utility classes and methods for the {@link Xml @Xml} annotation.
027 *
028 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
029 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../../index.html#jm.XmlDetails">XML Details</a>
030 * </ul>
031 */
032public class XmlAnnotation {
033
034   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
035   // Static
036   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
037
038   /** Default value */
039   public static final Xml DEFAULT = create().build();
040
041   /**
042    * Instantiates a new builder for this class.
043    *
044    * @return A new builder object.
045    */
046   public static Builder create() {
047      return new Builder();
048   }
049
050   /**
051    * Instantiates a new builder for this class.
052    *
053    * @param on The targets this annotation applies to.
054    * @return A new builder object.
055    */
056   public static Builder create(Class<?>...on) {
057      return create().on(on);
058   }
059
060   /**
061    * Instantiates a new builder for this class.
062    *
063    * @param on The targets this annotation applies to.
064    * @return A new builder object.
065    */
066   public static Builder create(String...on) {
067      return create().on(on);
068   }
069
070   /**
071    * Creates a copy of the specified annotation.
072    *
073    * @param a The annotation to copy.s
074    * @param r The var resolver for resolving any variables.
075    * @return A copy of the specified annotation.
076    */
077   public static Xml copy(Xml a, VarResolverSession r) {
078      return
079         create()
080         .childName(r.resolve(a.childName()))
081         .format(a.format())
082         .namespace(r.resolve(a.namespace()))
083         .on(r.resolve(a.on()))
084         .onClass(a.onClass())
085         .prefix(r.resolve(a.prefix()))
086         .build();
087   }
088
089   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
090   // Builder
091   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
092
093   /**
094    * Builder class.
095    *
096    * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
097    *    <li class='jm'>{@link org.apache.juneau.BeanContext.Builder#annotations(Annotation...)}
098    * </ul>
099    */
100   public static class Builder extends TargetedAnnotationTMFBuilder<Builder> {
101
102      String childName="", namespace="", prefix="";
103      XmlFormat format=XmlFormat.DEFAULT;
104
105      /**
106       * Constructor.
107       */
108      protected Builder() {
109         super(Xml.class);
110      }
111
112      /**
113       * Instantiates a new {@link Xml @Xml} object initialized with this builder.
114       *
115       * @return A new {@link Xml @Xml} object.
116       */
117      public Xml build() {
118         return new Impl(this);
119      }
120
121      /**
122       * Sets the {@link Xml#childName} property on this annotation.
123       *
124       * @param value The new value for this property.
125       * @return This object.
126       */
127      public Builder childName(String value) {
128         this.childName = value;
129         return this;
130      }
131
132      /**
133       * Sets the {@link Xml#format} property on this annotation.
134       *
135       * @param value The new value for this property.
136       * @return This object.
137       */
138      public Builder format(XmlFormat value) {
139         this.format = value;
140         return this;
141      }
142
143      /**
144       * Sets the {@link Xml#namespace} property on this annotation.
145       *
146       * @param value The new value for this property.
147       * @return This object.
148       */
149      public Builder namespace(String value) {
150         this.namespace = value;
151         return this;
152      }
153
154      /**
155       * Sets the {@link Xml#prefix} property on this annotation.
156       *
157       * @param value The new value for this property.
158       * @return This object.
159       */
160      public Builder prefix(String value) {
161         this.prefix = value;
162         return this;
163      }
164
165      // <FluentSetters>
166
167
168      // </FluentSetters>
169   }
170
171   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
172   // Implementation
173   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
174
175   private static class Impl extends TargetedAnnotationTImpl implements Xml {
176
177      private final String childName, namespace, prefix;
178      private final XmlFormat format;
179
180      Impl(Builder b) {
181         super(b);
182         this.childName = b.childName;
183         this.format = b.format;
184         this.namespace = b.namespace;
185         this.prefix = b.prefix;
186         postConstruct();
187      }
188
189      @Override /* Xml */
190      public String childName() {
191         return childName;
192      }
193
194      @Override /* Xml */
195      public XmlFormat format() {
196         return format;
197      }
198
199      @Override /* Xml */
200      public String namespace() {
201         return namespace;
202      }
203
204      @Override /* Xml */
205      public String prefix() {
206         return prefix;
207      }
208   }
209
210   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
211   // Appliers
212   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
213
214   /**
215    * Applies targeted {@link Xml} annotations to a {@link org.apache.juneau.Context.Builder}.
216    */
217   public static class Apply extends AnnotationApplier<Xml,Context.Builder> {
218
219      /**
220       * Constructor.
221       *
222       * @param vr The resolver for resolving values in annotations.
223       */
224      public Apply(VarResolverSession vr) {
225         super(Xml.class, Context.Builder.class, vr);
226      }
227
228      @Override
229      public void apply(AnnotationInfo<Xml> ai, Context.Builder b) {
230         Xml a = ai.inner();
231         if (isEmptyArray(a.on(), a.onClass()))
232            return;
233         b.annotations(copy(a, vr()));
234      }
235   }
236
237   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
238   // Other
239   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
240
241   /**
242    * A collection of {@link Xml @Xml annotations}.
243    */
244   @Documented
245   @Target({METHOD,TYPE})
246   @Retention(RUNTIME)
247   @Inherited
248   public static @interface Array {
249
250      /**
251       * The child annotations.
252       *
253       * @return The annotation value.
254       */
255      Xml[] value();
256   }
257}
